department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班
department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences

goal.ch: 本課程教授對象主要為地球科學及環境工程相關科系大學部三、四年級以上之學生，課程內容包含基礎水文統計方法、設計暴雨分析方法、水文模式(GWLF、SWMM)原理與應用，搭配R/python語言分析資料與展示結果。目的為使學生了解水文相關統計、頻率分析、設計暴雨、水文模擬之方法，以及程式語言工具之使用，培養具水文分析能力之人才，並提升學生於水文領域實務應用之競爭力。
goal.en: Hydrological analysis is a course for the 3rd/4th year undergraduates and master students from departments related to the College of Earth Sciences and to Environmental Engineering. This course covers mainly the basic statistical methods in hydrology, design storm analysis, hydrological models (GWLF and Storm Water Management Model SWMM) and their applications, together with the analysis demonstration based on R/python.The course aims at helping students understand methods related to hydrological statistics, frequency analysis, design storms, hydrological modeling, and programming language. Students are expected to obtain appropriate background knowledges of hydrological analysis to build up ability of independent thinking, and to apply the knowledge and ability in addressing real-life problems.

outline.ch:
1.Hydrological Frequency Analysis (I) and (II)
2.Weather generation for future scenarios
3.Future design storms
4.Watershed Hydrology
5.Streamflow simulation-GWLF
6.Storm Water Management Model-SWMM
7.Model performance evaluation
8.Machine learning
outline.en:
1.Hydrological Frequency Analysis (I) and (II)
2.Weather generation for future scenarios
3.Future design storms
4.Watershed Hydrology
5.Streamflow simulation-GWLF
6.Storm Water Management Model-SWMM
7.Model performance evaluation
8.Machine learning

textbook.ch:
1.Bedient, P.B., Huber, W.C., 2008. Hydrology and Floodplain Analysis.
2.Slides of ‘Stochastic Hydrology‘. Prof. Ke-Sheng Cheng. Department of Bioenvironmental Systems Engineering, National Taiwan University.
3.Gironas, J., L. A. Roesner, AND J. Davis. Storm Water Management Model Applications Manual. U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Washington, DC, EPA/600/R-09/077, 2009.
textbook.en:
1.Bedient, P.B., Huber, W.C., 2008. Hydrology and Floodplain Analysis.
2.Slides of ‘Stochastic Hydrology‘. Prof. Ke-Sheng Cheng. Department of Bioenvironmental Systems Engineering, National Taiwan University.
3.Gironas, J., L. A. Roesner, AND J. Davis. Storm Water Management Model Applications Manual. U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, Washington, DC, EPA/600/R-09/077, 2009.

gradMethod.ch: 期中報告(20％)，期末報告(20％)，作業與課堂參與 (60％)
gradMethod.en: Project midterm presentation (20％), Project final presentation(20％), Homework and participation in class (60％)

flexDiscription.ch: 自修並討論SWMM應用手冊例題
flexDiscription.en: Self-learning and discussion of SWMM application manual

stus.department: 大氣科學學系大氣物理碩士班
